name: Misreflection
description:
There’s no one who better understands you than yourself. Work with your reflection to solve puzzles and complete challenges in Misreflection!

CURRENT LEVELS

  •  Catch
  • Carefully Guided

FEEDBACK

This game is currently in an alpha state. I believe that the game has the potential to be great, but it absolutely needs player feedback to reach that point. I hope you give the game a chance and join the discussion over on the Discord server!

Discord: https://discord.gg/GyvUY5TSVQ

FUTURE DEVELOPMENT

Whether or not players find this project and decide to join alongside the development process, development on the game will continue. Until the game's idea is proven to be inexecutable, I will continue to dedicate my spare time to building this project into a complete, fun and unique experience.
